title: Nasi goreng with lime and sugar barbecued chicken
description: Rick Stein serves up tasty Indonesian fried rice - ideal for barbecues, or for using up leftover cooked meat and veg.For this recipe you will need 8-16 bamboo skewers (18cm/7in long), soaked in cold water for 1 hour.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz skinned boneless chicken thighs, each cut into 2.5cm/1in strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
5cm/2in piece cucumber, cut into quarters lengthways, sliced
8 spring onions, trimmed, thinly sliced on the diagonal
salt and freshly ground black pepper
